## Description {#details}

A class for recording information about inlining a landing pad.

### forwardResume() {#adcbc4d7e8bf9926797b48a2b3603e3a4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LandingPadInliningInfo::forwardResume (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/resumeinst">ResumeInst</a> &#42; RI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/landingpadinst">LandingPadInst</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; InlinedLPads)</>}>
Forward the &#39;resume&#39; instruction to the caller&#39;s landing pad block.

When the landing pad block has only one predecessor, this is a simple branch. When there is more than one predecessor, we need to split the landing pad block after the landingpad instruction and jump to there.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/inlinefunction-cpp/#l00167">167</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/inlinefunction-cpp">InlineFunction.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
